bibl.title: Bemerkungen zu Urkunden.

Graham Claytor, A Schedule of Contracts and a Private Letter: P.Fay. 344, BASP 50 (2013) pp. 77-121]. - P. Mich. Inv. 1354 [ed.: Daniel Ullucci, A Loan of Wheat, BASP 50 (2013) pp. 129-134, 1 pl.].
